links.title: Slackware
links.description: the most "Unix-like" Linux distribution.

links.title: OpenBSD
links.description: multi-platform 4.4BSD-based UNIX-like operating system.

links.title: HardenedBSD
links.description: HardenedBSD aims to implement innovative exploit mitigation and security solutions.

links.title: Kali Linux
links.description: Linux distribution used for Penetration Testing, Ethical Hacking and network security assessments.

links.title: Parrot Security OS
links.description: cyber security GNU/Linux environment.

links.title: Backbox Linux
links.description: penetration test and security assessment oriented Ubuntu-based Linux distribution.

links.title: BlackArch
links.description: is an Arch Linux-based penetration testing distribution for penetration testers.

links.title: Pentoo
links.description: is a security-focused livecd based on Gentoo.

links.title: Security Onion
links.description: Linux distro for intrusion detection, enterprise security monitoring, and log management.

links.title: Tails
links.description: is a live system that aims to preserve your privacy and anonymity.

links.title: vedetta
links.description: OpenBSD router boilerplate.

links.title: Qubes OS
links.description: is a security-oriented OS that uses Xen-based virtualization.

links.title: Varnish Cache
links.description: HTTP accelerator designed for content-heavy dynamic web sites.

links.title: Nginx
links.description: open source web and reverse proxy server that is similar to Apache, but very light weight.

links.title: OpenResty
links.description: is a dynamic web platform based on NGINX and LuaJIT.

links.title: Tengine
links.description: a distribution of Nginx with some advanced features.

links.title: Caddy Server
links.description: is an open source, HTTP/2-enabled web server with HTTPS by default.

links.title: HAProxy
links.description: the reliable, high performance TCP/HTTP load balancer.

links.title: Unbound
links.description: validating, recursive, and caching DNS resolver (with TLS).

links.title: Knot Resolver
links.description: caching full resolver implementation, including both a resolver library and a daemon.

links.title: PowerDNS
links.description: is an open source authoritative DNS server, written in C++ and licensed under the GPL.

links.title: 3proxy
links.description: tiny free proxy server.

links.title: Emerald Onion
links.description: is a 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization and transit internet service provider (ISP).

links.title: pi-hole
links.description: the Pi-hole® is a DNS sinkhole that protects your devices from unwanted content.

links.title: maltrail
links.description: malicious traffic detection system.

links.title: security_monkey
links.description: monitors AWS, GCP, OpenStack, and GitHub orgs for assets and their changes over time.

links.title: firecracker
links.description: secure and fast microVMs for serverless computing.

links.title: streisand
links.description: sets up a new server running your choice of WireGuard, OpenSSH, OpenVPN, and more.
